column5: I had a few clients out for Bass on the weekend ..Saturday was a bumpy day but Sunday morning was much better. We got into a bunch of these big girls still full of eggs ...5 ft of water useing Phenix 4 " Twisters Black with Silver Fleck was the ticket this weekend right close to shore ..
Sweet fish. Glad it worked out for your clients. looks like a Solid 6lb Erie smally?
Very nice smallie! Erie sure has some world class smallie fishing! Even though thats the nicer day, it still looks pretty wavy!

Yes it started to kick up around 11am then we headed for the River for some walleye ...what a zoo never seen 100s of boats in the Lower Grand in all my years ...must be the tastey sewage water that atracted all these fisher people ...lol..
